hero.title: Cleaning Service From World Class Agency.
hero.subtitle: Our services go beyond the basic services and provide you with clean your home and enhance your life.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Why will you choose our Services?
text: includes everything that will help to bring order and cleanliness to your home.
We use only ecological cleaning products for the safety of your health.

service.title: Services
service.subtitle: Our Best Services
service.text: We offer many services to meet your requirements and needs.

servise_items.title: Spring-cleaning
servise_items.text: During the general cleaning process, we remove dust and dirt from wherever it may be, even in the most difficult to reach places.

servise_items.title: Supportive cleaning
servise_items.text: We wash floors, remove dust, polish glass, polish furniture.

servise_items.title: Cleaning after construction
servise_items.text: We wash windows, remove large and small debris, clean furniture, etc.

servise_items.title: Window cleaning
servise_items.text: Cleaning glass from dirt, wet washing the frame, washing ebbs, window sills, slopes.

servise_items.title: Cleaning of offices
servise_items.text: Daily cleaning, one-time general cleaning, interior window cleaning.

servise_items.title: Daily cleaning of premises
servise_items.text: Daily cleaning of office premises includes comprehensive cleaning and maintaining cleanliness throughout the working day.

servise_items.title: Wife for an hour
servise_items.text: The whole range of housekeeping activities. Preparing the house for the arrival of guests, preparing treats, cleaning after the event.

servise_items.title: Washing of facades, billboards, banners
servise_items.text: We will help you keep your billboard, banner, sign (at the entrance to a store, building) clean and presentable.

servise_items.title: Dry cleaning of upholstered furniture
servise_items.text: We will help you quickly update and refresh your interior, getting rid of dust, plaque, mites, microorganisms, stains of any nature.

servise_items.title: Dry cleaning of carpets and rugs
servise_items.text: Periodic dry cleaning of carpets using professional means can restore their newness, freshness and beauty.

how.title: How we work
how.subtitle: A few steps to get started.
how.text: To start work, we need to know all the details and requirements. So, cooperation begins with the following steps.

how_items.title: Leave a request or call
how_items.text: We will contact you soon to clarify the issue.

how_items.title: We determine the scope of work
how_items.text: We will calculate the cost and agree on the date of execution.

how_items.title: We do the work
how_items.text: We perform all necessary work professionally and qualitatively.

how_items.title: Acceptance of work
how_items.text: You accept the work of our specialists, after which you make payment.

why.title: Why Choose Us
why.subtitle: The cleanliness of your apartments is our priority.
why.text: We perform our services qualitatively, on time and quickly.

advantages_items.title: Move Out Cleaning
advantages_items.text: We leave for cleaning as quickly as possible, in our own transport and with all the necessary equipment.

advantages_items.title: Regular & Monthly Cleaning
advantages_items.text: We will plan the cleaning and perform it at the agreed time.

advantages_items.title: Customer orientation
advantages_items.text: We always listen to the needs of our customers and are happy to go to a meeting.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: We offer quality cleaning at the lowest prices.
pricing.text: You can choose the most convenient option for you: regular or one-time cleaning.
pricing.second_text: In addition, we provide services to both individuals and legal entities (with the conclusion of a contract).
